TITLE: Monero (cryptocurrency) - Wikipedia
DESCRIPTION: Monero (XMR) is an open-source cryptocurrency created in April 2014 that focuses on privacy and decentralization that runs on Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS, and FreeBSD.
